text: "Last night I dreamt that Roger Daltryâ€™s wife told me to write about fashion and programming. We were in a small skate-punk shop. It was never made clear how she knew me or why she cared." I love everything about this.  @holly_cummins  https://t.co/UVdBqKvZrz

author.name: Charles Humble (@charleshumble@mastodon.social)
author.description: Editor In Chief at Container Solutions, host of the "Hacking the org" podcast, freelance tech writer, 1/2 of Twofish. I'd rather be making music.
